quest.name: Jumping on a Grenade
journal: Rafold hopes to turn a curse into a cure.
Rafold has asked you to harvest a grenade claw. Lie in ambush at Dalamud's Talons for a grenade, and slay the creature for its appendage.
You have obtained a grenade claw. Deliver it to Memezofu at the Ceruleum Processing Plant.
Memezofu is thankful for your delivery, as he had just exhausted his supply of grenade claws.
objectives: Lurk at the specified location and slay a grenade for its claw.
Deliver the grenade claw to Memezofu.

dialogue.name: RAFOLD
dialogue.text: Danger lurks near Dalamud's Talons, as the winds whisper the presence of grenades.

dialogue.name: RAFOLD
dialogue.text: No petty pest to purge, but the price of pain pays a prizeâ”€grenade claws.

dialogue.name: RAFOLD
dialogue.text: While I'm unfamiliar with the reagent's exact medicinal effect, I do know it serves to pacify my alchemist; an effect alone I deem invaluable.

dialogue.name: RAFOLD
dialogue.text: And we will certainly need salves in the days ahead. When you have slain the grenade and collected its claw, I would ask that you deliver it to Memezofu directly.

dialogue.name: MEMEZOFU
dialogue.text: No, no, no... I'm afraid this won't do at all. How is one to perform alchemy without reagents? I cannot simply make something out of nothing!

dialogue.name: MEMEZOFU
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, a grenade claw, and just when I'd run out! Good to know my pleas to Rafold were not entirely in vain.

dialogue.name: MEMEZOFU
dialogue.text: I shall tend to the task of formulating potions at once. On behalf of the several lives you've saved bringing me this, I thank you.
